properties.name: ChannelAddress
properties.description: The details that SSM Incident Manager uses when trying to engage the contact channel.

type.description: The details that SSM Incident Manager uses when trying to engage the contact channel.

properties.name: ChannelName
properties.description: The device name. String of 6 to 50 alphabetical, numeric, dash, and underscore characters.

type.description: The device name. String of 6 to 50 alphabetical, numeric, dash, and underscore characters.

properties.name: ChannelType
properties.description: Device type, which specify notification channel. Currently supported values: “SMS”, “VOICE”, “EMAIL”, “CHATBOT.

type.description: Device type, which specify notification channel. Currently supported values: “SMS”, “VOICE”, “EMAIL”, “CHATBOT.

properties.name: DeferActivation
properties.description: If you want to activate the channel at a later time, you can choose to defer activation. SSM Incident Manager can't engage your contact channel until it has been activated.

type.description: If you want to activate the channel at a later time, you can choose to defer activation. SSM Incident Manager can't engage your contact channel until it has been activated.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the engagement to a contact channel.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the engagement to a contact channel.
